body_html:
When pandas check index value:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/indexing.py#L2075
...it comes down here:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/dtypes/inference.py#L283-L284
return (isinstance(obj, Iterable) and not isinstance(obj, string_and_binary_types))
A 0-d tensor returns True on isinstance(obj, Iterable) call. But returns an error on iter() call.

When pandas check index value:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/indexing.py#L2075
...it comes down here:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/dtypes/inference.py#L283-L284
    return (isinstance(obj, Iterable) and not isinstance(obj, string_and_binary_types))
A 0-d tensor returns True on isinstance(obj, Iterable) call. But returns an error on iter() call.
body:
When pandas check index value:
[https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/indexing.py#L2075](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/indexing.py#L2075)
...it comes down here:
[https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/dtypes/inference.py#L283-L284](https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/blob/1a23779f09abc6ebf908d66ee88b973b767e2e3c/pandas/core/dtypes/inference.py#L283-L284)
`    return (isinstance(obj, Iterable) and
            not isinstance(obj, string_and_binary_types))`
A 0-d tensor returns True on isinstance(obj, Iterable) call. But returns an error on iter() call.
